snippet: The Scarlet Knights improved to 5-0 as the top-ranked defense held the Connecticut Huskies to 54 rushing yards in Saturday’s victory.
abstract: College Football East Roundup; Rutgers beats Connecticut, 19-3.
lead_paragraph: The Scarlet Knights improved to 5-0 as the top-ranked defense held the Connecticut Huskies to 54 rushing yards in Saturday’s victory.

headline.seo: Bottling Up Connecticut, Rutgers Stays Undefeated
headline.print_headline: Its Defense Unyielding, Rutgers Stifles UConn to Stay Unbeaten

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
